column1: plan  No.1352  vide  second  schedule  of  the  amended  plaint  dated 05.09.1983  has  not
referred to a land called MAWATHHENA, whereby the 5th Defendant-Appellant got title
by deed No. 3516 (5වි 1), to KAKUNGAHAWATTE which is the corpus to be partitioned
